DD::Image::Concurrency::ReadGuard Class Reference

Public Member Functions

 ReadGuard (Concurrency::ReadWriteLock &rwLock)
 

Detailed Description

Guard that performs a read lock on ctor and unlock on dtor. Use for scoping a read lock to get automatic unlocking.
